name: Bizmuth
description:
Greetings!

Bizmuth is an action platformer game where we play a boy with superpowers

Does It Have a Story?

Our character, playing with superhero toys, starts to think about his own superpower. He embarks on a journey to discover his own superpower. After surviving his difficult journey, he learns that all the superpowers he wants are hidden within him

This game was made in three days for Mağara Jam 4 hosted by at0m

Controls

Move: W, A, S, D
Dash: Shift
Teleport: R
Pick Up: F
Fire: LMB (Left Mouse Button)
Restart Room: T
Main Menu: Esc

Who Play This Game?

• Those who like to play mini platformer games
• People in the Mağara community
• Mağara Jam judges and attendees
• Our friends who are curious about the game we made

System Requirements

You can even play on a Calculator
